name: Bone Knight
book: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

traits.Commander of Bones: As a bonus action, the knight can target one skeleton or zombie it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14+1d6 + 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must obey the knight's commands until the knight dies or until the knight releases it as a bonus action. The knight can command up to twelve undead at a time this way.
traits.Master of the Pallid Banner: While within 60 feet of the knight, any undead ally of the knight has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.Multiattack: The knight attacks twice with one of its weapons.
actions.Greatsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d6 + 1 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.
